Description_lang: Bind a spectral essence to an enemy for $d, causing allied attacks to heal for $s2% of damage dealt, up to $s1 total healing.When the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing bursts, healing up to $s3 allies within $345704a1 yds.
AuraDescription_lang: Attacks heal for $s2% of damage dealt, with $w1 healing remaining.If the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing is split between $s3 allies within $345704a1 yds.
